MEETING PRIVILEGES
Hassle-Free Meeting Package
Book your next meeting with us at Marco Polo Hotels – Hong Kong. We are taking stringent measures to maintain high standards of hygiene and precautionary measures, including:
•Table and chair placement spaced to avoid close contact
•Individually plated coffee breaks
•Individually served set lunch
•Individual storage for mask
•Bottled water and glass covers
From now until 31 August, enjoy special rates on Full Day Meeting Packages at Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel from HK$690 per person; HK$460 per person for Half Day Meeting Package.
* Rates are subject to a 10% service charge; terms and conditions apply.
More details
